title: [Fictional] CNN: HKPF attacked the White House

replies.msg:
CNN Special News: Hong Kong Police Force Special Tactics Squad attacked the White House with rubber bullets and tear gas, killing all the officers and first-responding Navy SEALs with the highly toxic PRC-made tear gas. There are now a live video feed showing that President Donald Trump is being beated and tortured by the Special Tactics Squad members who threats him to immediately withdraw the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act and declare surrender in the Trade War by signing PRC's ridiculous trade deal. This is the only successful attack of the White House since the British's attack in 1812.













As an immediate response to the terrorist attack, United States and Russia jointed force to launch an immediate strike in the PRC, killing all one hundred millions of Communist Party members and government officials, as well as the whole PRC armed force populating ten millions of soliders. Emperor Xi decided to self-dentonate all nuclear missles and bombs for an attempt to wipe out all of his people, as a last resort action. Fortunately he was shot with a magic round by US Area 51 Special Force and turned into a Winnie the Pooh before he can confirm the launch.

His death allows an end of the ridiculous story of how the accidental pregnancy of a Hong Kong girl leads to a nearly World War III situation, which wiped out 10% of the PRC population.

Pentagon sources confirms that the US Air Force made a decision to flatten White House with bombs after President Trump was beaten to death by Special Tactics Squad members accidentally which they decided to throw his body off from the roof of White House pretending he suicided. All Special Tactics Squad members are killed in the strike.
